General.Name: DYPNF Co.Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: DYPNF Co.,Ltd provides solid handling systems worldwide. The company offers pneumatic and mechanical conveying systems, and storage and blending silos. It serves various industries, including petrochemical, energy, IT/electricity, electronics, environment, steel, component material, etc. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: IT Premier Tower 345-50, Seoul, South Korea
